recipe.name: Fruit Pizza
recipe.notes: I haven't yet figured out whether this sounds really good or really like too much sugar.
recipe.preparation:
Slice and press together the sugar cookie roll into a 12-inch greased pizza pan. Baked at 350 degrees for 11 to 15 minutes. Cool.
Mix cream cheese, sugar and vanilla until light and fluffy and spread over cooled crust. Cover with fruit: fresh strawberries, raspberries and blueberries are delicious as are drained canned peaches and apricots. If the fruit will discolor (like bananas), cover with a glaze of 1/3 cup preserves and 2 tablespoons water.
recipe.source_name: "Family Favorites", Epiphany School Lady's Guild, Linda Desimone presiding. Recipe by Nadine Goyhenetche.
